metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39291 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source Closed-circuit television softwareapplication. Affected versions of zoneminder are subject to a vulnerabilitywhich allows users with "View" system permissions to inject new data intothe logs stored by Zoneminder. This was observed through an HTTP POSTrequest containing log information to the "/zm/index.php" endpoint.Submission is not rate controlled and could affect database performanceand/or consume all storage resources. Users are advised to upgrade. Thereare no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
